mapper.sql:
select * from gr_reservation
where DE_LICENCENUM = #{de_licencenum} and not RE_APPROVAL like 'N'
where MB_ID = #{mb_id} and RE_APPROVAL like 'Y'
and RE_DATA >= date_add(now(), interval -1 day) order by RE_DATE desc
mapper.insert: insert into gr_reservation (DE_LICENCENUM, MB_ID, RE_APPROVAL, RE_DATE, RE_NOWDATE, RE_SPECIES, RE_WEIGHT, RE_CUT) values (#{de_licencenum}, #{mb_id}, 'U', #{re_date}, now(), #{re_species}, #{re_weight}, #{re_cut})
mapper.select: SELECT * from gr_reservation r, gr_registration d, gr_member m where r.mb_id = m.mb_id and r.de_licencenum = d.de_licencenum and r.de_licencenum = #{de_licencenum}
SELECT * FROM gr_reservation r, gr_registration d, gr_member m WHERE r.de_licencenum = d.de_licencenum AND r.mb_id = m.mb_id AND r.mb_id = #{mb_id}
